titles.title: Improving Veteran Access to Care Act
Improving Veteran Access to Care Act
Improving Veteran Access to Care Act
Improving Veteran Access to Care Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish an integrated project team to improve the process for scheduling appointments for health care from the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish and implement a plan to improve the process for scheduling appointments for health care from the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 272.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To
